title: Port Royale - Gold, Power and Pirates
description:
Port Royale - Gold, Power and Pirates patch v1.4.0.3

Establish your reputation, build farms and plantations and construct trade routes throughout the many towns. But beware of notorious pirates who lie in wait to cheat you of your precious cargo!

Set sail and embark upon your journey through the Caribbean. Trade, discovery and piracy thrive in the New World as you struggle for supremacy with the four great nations.

Become a buccaneer by order of the government! Plunder and seize the towns of your enemies. Amass a commanding fleet and you could even strike the pirates first! During the naval battles all the ships, damage, smoke and blazing fires are displayed in stunningly realistic 3D.

      Key Features

    * Full Pick Up & Play Tutorial Mode

    * Choose your own destiny ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ be a trader or pirate!

    * Develop your status, buy/sell goods, construct farms & plantations

    * Discover missions ranging from hidden treasures to capturing towns

    * 60 towns to visit and secret pirate hideouts to uncover

    * Massive playing area covering the Caribbean ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½New WorldÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½

    * Play as one of the 4 great nations: English, French, Spanish or Dutch

    * Real-time, full 3D sea battles with up to 20 ships

    * - Historic rivalry between the pirates and buccaneers

    * Multiplayer mode: Up to 8 players (via network or internet)

    * Select from 1024x768 and 1280x1024 resolutions



      System Requirements

      Minimum
      Processor - Pentium II 450 MHz
      RAM - 64Mb
      Graphics - 16Mb 3D Accelerated (DirectX8.1 compatible)
      CD-ROM - 4x
      Other - DirectX 9.1 compatible Graphics, Microsoft compatible mouse, DirectX compatible soundcard
      System - Windows 98/ME/2000/XP

      Recommended
      Processor - Pentium III 900 MHz
      RAM - 128Mb
      Graphics - 32Mb 3D Accelerated (DirectX8.1 compatible)
      CD-ROM - 4x
